name.en: Technology Integrated  into the Hakka Language Instruction

department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系
department.en: Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: 本課程將以客語學習/教學為主題，透過理解科技內容教學知識(Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge (TPACK))，嘗試從三個面向來了解如何運用科技融入客語教學。1) 科技知識(TK)：各式數位工具/媒體；2) 內容知識(CK)：客語教學數位資源；3) 教學知識(PK)：各式教學/學習法。此外，也將介紹三面九項 —核心素養的滾動圓(108 課綱的「核心素養」)，並基於「素養導向」來製作TPACK專題設計與實踐，學生將有更多與小組成員進行討論和合作的機會，從而使他們能夠在模仿過程中向同學學習。如，準備製作TPACK專題設計、通過觀察和採納同學的想法來模仿同學。此外，學生可以透過共享來合作並組合所獲得的知識，也可以透過合作創作TPACK專題設計。在過程中，學生能輪流扮演不同的角色（例如，課程設計者、教學者、課程評估師、教育科技師等）；每個學生應負責自己的職責，並協助其他成員一起完成任務。因此，此步驟為學生提供了鷹架，以幫助他們共同設計TPACK專題並創建自己TPACK的微型課程專題，並促進學生之間的積極相互依存。
goal.en: This course will focus on Hakka language learning/teaching. Through understanding the technical content teaching knowledge (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge (TPACK)), try to know how to use technology to integrate Hakka language teaching from three aspects. 1) Technical knowledge (TK): various digital tools/media; 2) Content knowledge (CK): digital resources for Hakka language teaching; 3) Pedagogical knowledge (PK): various teaching/learning methods. In addition, three aspects and nine items - the rolling circle of core literacy (“core literacy“ in the 108 syllabi) will also be introduced, and TPACK thematic design and practice will be made based on “literacy orientation.“ Students will have more discussions and discussions with group members. Opportunities to collaborate so that they can learn from their classmates in the process of imitation. For example, prepare to make TPACK thematic design, and imitate classmates by observing and adopting classmates‘ ideas. In addition, students can collaborate and combine acquired knowledge through sharing and creating TPACK thematic designs through collaboration. During the process, students can play different roles (e.g., curriculum designer, educator, curriculum evaluator, educational technologist, etc.); each student should be responsible for their responsibilities and assist other members in completing tasks together. Therefore, this step provides the scaffolding for students to co-design TPACK topics, create their TPACK micro-course issues, and promote positive interdependence among students.

outline.ch:
1.掌握科技知識、內容知識與教學知識。
2.運用科技知識、內容知識與教學知識。
3.創建自己TPACK的微型課程專題。
outline.en:
1. Master scientific and technological knowledge, content knowledge, and teaching knowledge.
2. Apply technical knowledge, content knowledge, and pedagogical knowledge.
3. Create your TPACK mini-course topic.
